backend/main.mo: Defines data types and comparison utilities for cuisines, restaurants, menu items, and orders within a Motoko actor.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records linking UI removal features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining color variables, theming, and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling routing, authentication state, profile setup, and page layout.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying restaurant contact info, social links, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, authentication controls, cart count, and admin verification error handling.
frontend/src/components/LiveOrdersView.t: Displays and manages active orders with status updates, admin-only notifications for new orders, and menu item lookups.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for collecting and saving a user's profile with form validation and submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for profile, menu items, restaurant data, carts, and orders using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes and applying global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard for managing menu items and updating order statuses with dialogs and grouped listings.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Cart page showing items, user details, and order placement with editable customer info.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page listing menu items with search, filters, images, and add‑to‑cart support.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: User orders page displaying sorted orders with status badges and pricing.
frontend/src/pages/RestaurantPage.tsx: Placeholder restaurant page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/utils/requiredMenuItems.ts: Ensures mandatory menu items are included by merging required and fetched items.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining content paths, theme extensions for colors, layout, animations, and enabling typography, container query, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the food delivery app’s overall architecture, features, backend–frontend integration, and versions of existing functionality.
